name: equalize
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
[ T ] to make things or people equal: They are putting pressure on the government to equalize state pension ages between men and women.
[ I ] UK to get the point in a game or competition that makes your score the same as that of the other team or player: Spain managed to equalize in the last minute of the game.
